bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Alternative Names yong qi 擁氣 , congesting qi.

① Etiological Agent. identical with zhi qi 滯氣①, sluggish qi. Yao xing lun 藥性論 Substance Entry mu xiang 木香： 逐諸壅氣上衝，煩悶 , “It eliminates all obstruction qi that rush upward, with vexation and heart-pressure.

②Side effect of pharmaceutical substances, identical with zhi qi 滯氣② , sluggish qi. Shi liao ben cao 食療本草 Substance Entry da dou 大豆：小兒不得與炒豆食之。若食了，忽食豬 肉，必壅氣致死 , “Children must not eat fried beans. If they eat them and then immediately afterwards eat pork, this will result in obstruction qi leading to their death”.
